# Email from Martha Boyer to Jane Rigby, Sept 20, 2022.
#Here are some preliminary zeropoints from the Cycle 1 data.  They're aren't quite ready for prime time,
#but a quick check with the M92 ERS data suggest they're looking pretty good.
#I used the CALSPEC model for P330E -- I'm pretty sure it's the same one NIRISS is using, but I need to verify.
#I'm working on some data from an A-type star now, and we're getting a white dwarf standard a couple of days
#from now, so we'll have some good comparisons soon.
#
        filter   detector        PHOTMJSR                     std  
   CLEAR+F070W      NRCA1    4.183308652978862    0.011910866930127995  
   CLEAR+F090W      NRCA1    3.036615618032562    0.011878533907124345  
   CLEAR+F115W      NRCA1    2.947929712259784    0.005312714451422673

# Martha sent long wavelength folters on 9/23/2022
#Here are the preliminary P330E ZPs for the LW filters:
#        filter   detector   PHOTMJSR      std
